text: Paraluteres is a genus of filefishes native to the Indian and Pacific Oceans. ==Species== There are currently 2 recognized species in this genus:Matsuura, K. (2014): Taxonomy and systematics of tetraodontiform fishes: a review focusing primarily on progress in the period from 1980 to 2014. Ichthyological Research, 62 (1): 72-113. * Paraluteres arqat E. Clark & Gohar, 1953 * Paraluteres prionurus Bleeker, 1851 (False puffer) ==References== Category:Monacanthidae Category:Marine fish genera Category:Taxa named by Pieter Bleeker
title: Paraluteres
